per_frame_1=//per frame less reactive volume for all unused q vars, put before other q vars are set for cop out mashing
per_frame_2=vb = vb*0.95 + (1-vb)*pow(bass_att,2)*0.02;
per_frame_3=vvb = vvb*0.95 + (1-vvb)*vb*0.01;
per_frame_4=vm = vm*0.95 + (1-vm)*pow(mid_att,2)*0.02;
per_frame_5=vvm = vvm*0.95 + (1-vvm)*vm*0.01;
per_frame_6=vt = vt*0.95 + (1-vt)*pow(treb_att,2)*0.02;
per_frame_7=vvt = vvt*0.95 + (1-vvt)*vt*0.01;
per_frame_8=vvb = min(1,max(0,vvb));
per_frame_9=vvm = min(1,max(0,vvm));
per_frame_10=vvt = min(1,max(0,vvt));
per_frame_11=q1 = vvb*2;//0.5 + vb - vvb;
per_frame_12=q2 = vvm*2;//0.5 + vm - vvm;
per_frame_13=q3 = vvt*2;//0.5 + vt - vvt;
per_frame_14=q4=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_15=q5=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_16=q6=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_17=q7=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_18=q8=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_19=q9=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_20=q10=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_21=q11=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_22=q12=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_23=q13=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_24=q14=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_25=q15=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_26=q16=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_27=q17=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_28=q18=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_29=q19=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_30=q20=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_31=q21=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_32=q22=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_33=q23=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_34=q24=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_35=q25=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_36=q26=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_37=q27=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_38=q28=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_39=q29=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_40=q30=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_41=q31=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_42=q32=(q1+q2+q3)*5;
per_frame_43=
per_frame_44=warp = 0;
per_frame_45=
per_frame_46=tic = min(time-tin,.1);
per_frame_47=tin = time;
per_frame_48=
per_frame_49=ra = 1/tic*.25;
per_frame_50=
per_frame_51=treb_avg = tic*(treb_avg*(1/tic - ra) + ra*treb);
per_frame_52=mid_avg = tic*(mid_avg*(1/tic - ra) + ra*mid);
per_frame_53=bass_avg = tic*(bass_avg*(1/tic - ra) + ra*bass);
per_frame_54=
per_frame_55=tt = tt + tic*treb;
per_frame_56=mt = mt + tic*mid;
per_frame_57=bt = bt + tic*bass;
per_frame_58=
per_frame_59=q1 = tt*4;
per_frame_60=q2 = mt*4;
per_frame_61=q3 = bt*4;
per_frame_62=
per_frame_63=st = .1;
per_frame_64=base = .15;
per_frame_65=q4 = base + treb_avg*st;
per_frame_66=q5 = base + mid_avg*st;
per_frame_67=q6 = base + bass_avg*st;
per_pixel_1=ti = time*.3;
per_pixel_2=
per_pixel_3=mx = x - .5 + .25*(sin(ti*1.1278) + sin(ti*.7458));
per_pixel_4=my = y - .5 + .25*(sin(ti*.9454) + sin(ti*1.2378));
per_pixel_5=zm = cos(pow(mx*mx*1.5 + my*my,.5)*16 - q1)*q4;
per_pixel_6=dx = zm*(x-mx);
per_pixel_7=dy = zm*(y-my);
per_pixel_8=
per_pixel_9=mx = x - .5 + .25*(sin(ti*1.3488) + sin(ti*.8552));
per_pixel_10=my = y - .5 + .25*(sin(ti*.7366) + sin(ti*1.1447));
per_pixel_11=zm = cos(pow(mx*mx*1.5 + my*my,.5)*16 - q2)*q5;
per_pixel_12=dx = dx + zm*mx;
per_pixel_13=dy = dy + zm*my;
per_pixel_14=
per_pixel_15=mx = x - .5 + .25*(sin(ti*1.3544) + sin(ti*.8926));
per_pixel_16=my = y - .5 + .25*(sin(ti*.9021) + sin(ti*1.2468));
per_pixel_17=zm = cos(pow(mx*mx*1.5 + my*my,.5)*16 - q3)*q6;
per_pixel_18=dx = dx + zm*mx;
per_pixel_19=dy = dy + zm*my;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = lerp(tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz,GetBlur1(uv),.075+.09*bass);
warp_5=`    
warp_6=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_7=`    ret = ret-0.001;
warp_8=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    ret = .9*tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_4=`    ret += .5*GetBlur1(uv)+.1*GetBlur3(uv);
comp_5=`    ret = lerp(ret,.8-saturate(GetPixel(uv)+.5*GetBlur1(uv)),frac(rad*4.5+.5*time-.159*9*ang));
comp_6=` 
comp_7=` float2 uve = (uv-.5)*float2(-1,-1)+.5;
comp_8=` float3 ret2 = .9*tex2D(sampler_main, uve).xyz;
comp_9=`    ret2 += .5*GetBlur1(uve)+.1*GetBlur3(uve);
comp_10=`    ret2 = lerp(ret2,.8-saturate(GetPixel(uve)+.5*GetBlur1(uve)),frac(rad*4.5+.5*time+.159*9*ang));
comp_11=`
comp_12=`ret = lerp(ret,ret2,.5);
comp_13=`
comp_14=`    ret = pow(lum(ret),2)*ret*1.75;
comp_15=`
comp_16=`ret *= (1.5-2*rad);
comp_17=`
comp_18=`
comp_19=`}
